mcq.statement: Who built Hazuri Bagh in 1813 to celebrate the capture of the Koh-i-Noor Diamond?
mcq.one_liner: Hazuri Bagh was constructed in 1813 by **Maharajah Ranjit Singh** to commemorate his acquisition of the Koh-i-Noor Diamond.
